participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, often introspective and sensitive to emotional experiences.
participant_1.background: My heart breaks when I think about the time my dog died. I like to express my style through my fashion. I work 2 jobs. I'm not sure how to fit in with people my age because I didn't have much social interaction when I was younger. I enjoy my summers and keep up with my family on weekends.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and athletic, with a passion for family and a creative spirit.
participant_2.background: I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation. I like to go running. I am angry at my coworker. My new home will be a place where I can express my creativity and individuality, and where I can feel safe and comfortable. I did not go to college because I run the family farm.

content.text: I am not sure how to fit in with people my age because I didn't have much social interaction when I was younger.
I feel the same way. I did not go to college because I run the family farm.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go running and spend time with my family.
I like to run too! I also like to express my style through my fashion.
That's nice. I'm angry at my coworker. I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.
That sounds fun! I like Taylor Swift.
What are you looking forward to?
My new home will be a place where I can express my creativity and individuality, and where I can feel safe and comfortable.
